attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as british citizens we really must put a stop to imigration into our beloved country.These people come to live here then decide that our people owe them.We owe them absolutely nothing and as proud british citizens we tell the government that ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!!!
what is the point in a government if they don't listen to the people?LISTEN TO US instead of cowering every time the E.U. in Brussells barks orders!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
